mesquite.lib.characters

Interface CharSpecsSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable, Listable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharacterPartition, CharBitsSet, CharInclusionSet, CharNumSet, CharObjectSpecsSet, CharRateMatrixModelSet, CharRatesModelSet, CharSelectionSet, CharSort, CharWeightSet, CodonPositionsSet, GenCodeModelSet, ModelSet, ParsimonyModelSet, ProbabilityModelSet, StateFreqModelSet

    public interface CharSpecsSet
extends Listable, Identifiable
    This abstract class serves to superclass weight sets, model sets, inclusion sets, character sets, and any other listing of characters with specification of values for each character. The different sorts of specsets are stored in different vectors within a CharacterData object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addParts(int starting, int num)
      Add num characters just after "starting" (filling with default values)
      boolean deleteParts(int starting, int num)
      Delete characters specified
      CharacterData getCharacterData() 
      boolean moveParts(int first, int num, int justAfter)
      Move num characters starting at first, to just after character justAfter
      boolean swapParts(int first, int second)
